title: Krunker.io
author: Yendis Entertainment
description: Krunker is a remarkable first-person shooter game where you fall right into a dark world, tasked with fighting against other players from around the world.

title: Moomoo.io
author: Yendis Entertainment
description: MooMoo.io is a multiplayer base building and survival game. Collect resources around the map to build a village. Your Windmills generate points over time. But make sure to protect them from other players.

title: 1 on 1 Soccer
description:
Don't you enjoy the straight-forward athletic duels on the field? In 1 on 1 Soccer, you get to face off against another player (Computer or real) in a 2 player football match. Run up against the ball to kick it across the field. Jump up in the air to move the ball with your head, or to simply stand on your opponent's. A match only lasts five minutes. Before you know it, you're itching for a rematch.

The easy gameplay makes this soccer match fun and addictive. Grab your best friend and play a duell to find out who can handle the ball better. Aim into your opponent's goal and try to keep it as far away as possible from your own. What are you waiting for? Have some sporty fun with those funny looking figures in 1 on 1 Soccer, online and for free on Silvergames.com!

Controls: WASD / Arrows = Move/Jump

title: 1v1.LOL
description: Discover 1v1, the online building simulator & third person shooting game. Battle royale, build fight, box fight, zone wars and more game modes to enjoy!

title: A Fancy Pants Adventure
description: In this game you take control of Fancy Pants - a cool stickman character who wears awesome and colorful pants! You must help our fancy hero work his way through a myriad of cool levels and avoid various obstacles, monsters and creatures on his way!

title: Alien Hominid
description: Your UFO has crash landed, and the FBI is out to get you! Time to take them out!
author: Tom Fulp

title: The Chroma Incident
description: The Achromats have taken the worlds color offline! Raid their colorless lair and vanquish them all, restoring the world to it's technicolor glory.
author: Ryan Malm

title: Chrome Dinosaur
author: Google
description: The Dinosaur Game is a browser game developed by Google and built into the Google Chrome web browser. The player guides a pixelated Tyrannosaurus rex across a side-scrolling landscape, avoiding obstacles to achieve a higher score.

title: Cookie Clicker
description: Cookie Clicker is an idle clicker game. Bake millions of delicious cookies by clicking on a giant cookie.
author: Orteil

title: Cubefield
description: Cubefield is a fast-paced endless running game that tests your ability to dodge obstacles at high speed.
author: Nils Asejevs

title: Fireboy & Watergirl Into the Forest Temple
Run 3
author: Player03
description:
There’s a whole new galaxy waiting to be explored! Use the arrow keys to run and jump through the space tunnels. Use the left and right arrow keys to rotate the world as you go. 

There are two ways you can play Run 3: Explore Mode and Infinite Mode. To add more levels to your Galaxy Map, choose Explore Mode. The Runner will encounter lots of new tunnels and areas, and may bump into some friends along the way! 

For an endless run, choose Infinite Mode. You’ll find power cells scattered across the tunnels in this mode. You’ll have to watch your step though! If you fall out of the tunnel in Infinite Mode, it’s game over. You can use power cells to continue your run with a new character.

title: Slope
author: Y8 Studios
description: Slope is the ultimate running game that will put your skills to the test. Speed down on a randomized slope. The farther you go, the faster your ball travels. This game might look simple but playing this will give you extreme adrenaline rush. Just remember to avoid obstacles and those red blocks. Always be on track to get a high score and you might have your name on the leaderboard!

title: The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap
The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
